Articles.Content:
In the pass I created a steel structure and expected it to sink hitting the ocean floor and to my surprise it had flotation, recently I just had a steel barge that was built in an earlier version and tried it with this current 1.0.5 Version and to my surprise it sunk like a brick? I love it! but was this actually added to the physics of the game?

Edited March 14, 2016 by castille7

Yes, they changed the buoyancy calculations; submersibles are a thing now, too.  Of note is that ore sinks; using different tank sizes in combination allows for a crude but effective stock ballast control.
Yes I already use Ore Tanks, you can see that demonstrated here Scuba Do. Also thank you for the reply this answered my question!
